summary: Financial loss calculator, AI-powered legal defense generator with PDF export, dark mode optimized for drivers
architectural_notes: Target audience: drivers requiring legal and financial tools
Dark mode as primary UI theme
AI integration needed for legal defense text generation
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Professional dashboard icon for financial calculator showing currency symbols or coins in warm earth tones (calculator-icon.dim_128x128.png)
- Professional dashboard icon for legal defense generator showing scales of justice or document in warm earth tones (legal-icon.dim_128x128.png)
- Hero background image for dashboard with abstract geometric pattern in dark mode colors with subtle texture (hero-bg.dim_1920x1080.png)

existing_features.title: Create a financial loss calculator that allows drivers to input trip data (distance, fuel costs, tolls, maintenance, fines) and calculates total financial losses with a breakdown of each category

Build an AI-powered legal defense generator that takes incident details (date, location, type of violation, circumstances) and generates a structured legal defense document with arguments, applicable laws, and suggested next steps
Implement PDF export functionality for both financial loss calculations and legal defense documents, with professional formatting including headers, sections, and branding
Design and implement a comprehensive dark mode UI optimized for drivers, featuring high contrast, large touch targets, clear typography, and a professional color scheme avoiding blue and purple tones
Create a dashboard homepage that provides quick access to the financial calculator, legal defense generator, and previously saved calculations and defenses with clear visual cards

new_feature_requests.summary: Dark mode UI optimized for drivers
